CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By regulating the composition of the electrondeficient units , broad absorptions of the random copolymers , P2-P6 were observed from 400 to 900 nm compared to the parent polymers , P1 and P7 , indicating that incorporating two different electron - deficient units into polymer backbone is an effective method to broaden the absorption band and control the optical band gap.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the form of a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P2 |
| P6 |
| the parent polymers, P1 |
| P7 |
| polymer backbone |

Note: I have expanded the abbreviated form of "the parent polymers, P1" to help readers understand the context better.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have identified the following "Material Name" entities in the form of a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P2 |
| P6 |
| P1 |
| P7 |

Note: I have removed "polymer backbone" as it is not a specific material name, but rather a general term for the structure of a polymer.
